name: http
description: HTTP client and server (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH)
exports: get(url: String, headers: Map<String, String>) -> Result<HTTPResponse, String>
post(url: String, body: String, headers: Map<String, String>) -> Result<HTTPResponse, String>
put(url: String, body: String) -> Result<HTTPResponse, String>
patch(url: String, body: String) -> Result<HTTPResponse, String>
